attributes.name: model-value
attributes.desc: binding value

attributes.name: v-model
attributes.desc: binding value

attributes.name: options
attributes.desc: data of the options, the key of value and label can be customize by props

attributes.name: [props](#props)
attributes.desc: configuration options, see the following table(2.4.2)

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.desc: is multiple

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.desc: is disabled

attributes.name: value-key
attributes.desc: unique identity key name for value, required when value is an object

attributes.name: size
attributes.desc: size of component

attributes.name: clearable
attributes.desc: whether select can be cleared

attributes.name: clear-icon
attributes.desc: custom clear icon

attributes.name: collapse-tags
attributes.desc: whether to collapse tags to a text when multiple selecting

attributes.name: multiple-limit
attributes.desc: maximum number of options user can select when multiple is true. No limit when set to 0

attributes.name: id
attributes.desc: native input id input

attributes.name: name
attributes.desc: the name attribute of select input

attributes.name: effect
attributes.desc: tooltip theme, built-in theme: dark / light

attributes.name: autocomplete
attributes.desc: autocomplete of select input

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.desc: placeholder

attributes.name: filterable
attributes.desc: whether Select is filterable

attributes.name: allow-create
attributes.desc: whether creating new items is allowed. To use this, filterable must be true

attributes.name: filter-method
attributes.desc: custom filter method, the first parameter is the current input value. To use this, filterable must be true method

attributes.name: loading
attributes.desc: whether Select is loading data from server

attributes.name: loading-text
attributes.desc: displayed text while loading data from server, default is 'Loading'

attributes.name: reserve-keyword
attributes.desc: whether reserve the keyword after select filtered option.

attributes.name: default-first-option
attributes.desc: select first matching option on enter key. Use with filterable or remote

attributes.name: no-match-text
attributes.desc: displayed text when no data matches the filtering query, you can also use slot empty, default is 'No matching data'

attributes.name: no-data-text
attributes.desc: displayed text when there is no options, you can also use slot empty

attributes.name: popper-class
attributes.desc: custom class name for Select's dropdown and tags' tooltip

attributes.name: popper-style
attributes.desc: custom style for Select's dropdown and tags' tooltip(2.11.0)

attributes.name: teleported
attributes.desc: whether select dropdown is teleported, if true it will be teleported to where append-to sets

attributes.name: append-to
attributes.desc: which element the select dropdown appends to(2.8.8)

attributes.name: persistent
attributes.desc: when select dropdown is inactive and persistent is false, select dropdown will be destroyed

attributes.name: popper-options
attributes.desc: popper.js parameters

attributes.name: automatic-dropdown
attributes.desc: for non-filterable Select, this prop decides if the option menu pops up when the input is focused

attributes.name: fit-input-width
attributes.desc: whether the width of the dropdown is the same as the input, if the value is number, then the width is fixed(2.9.2)

attributes.name: suffix-icon
attributes.desc: custom suffix icon component(2.9.8)

attributes.name: height
attributes.desc: The height of the dropdown panel, 34px for each item

attributes.name: item-height
attributes.desc: The height of the dropdown item

attributes.name: scrollbar-always-on
attributes.desc: Controls whether the scrollbar is always displayed

attributes.name: remote
attributes.desc: whether search data from server

attributes.name: debounce
attributes.desc: debounce delay during remote search, in milliseconds(2.11.7)

attributes.name: remote-method
attributes.desc: function that gets called when the input value changes. Its parameter is the current input value. To use this, filterable must be true

attributes.name: remote-show-suffix
attributes.desc: in remote search method show suffix icon(2.11.9)

attributes.name: validate-event
attributes.desc: whether to trigger form validation

attributes.name: offset
attributes.desc: offset of the dropdown(2.8.8)

attributes.name: show-arrow
attributes.desc: whether the dropdown has an arrow(2.8.8)

attributes.name: placement
attributes.desc: position of dropdown
attributes.optionValue: top | top-start | top-end | bottom | bottom-start | bottom-end | left | left-start | left-end | right | right-start | right-end

attributes.name: fallback-placements
attributes.desc: list of possible positions for dropdown popper.js(2.5.6)

attributes.name: collapse-tags-tooltip
attributes.desc: whether show all selected tags when mouse hover text of collapse-tags. To use this, collapse-tags must be true(2.3.0)

attributes.name: max-collapse-tags
attributes.desc: The max tags number to be shown. To use this, collapse-tags must be true(2.3.0)

attributes.name: tag-type
attributes.desc: tag type(2.5.0)

attributes.name: tag-effect
attributes.desc: tag effect(2.7.7)

attributes.name: aria-label
attributes.desc: same as aria-label in native input(a11y) (2.5.0)

attributes.name: empty-values
attributes.desc: empty values of component, [see config-provider](/en-US/component/config-provider#empty-values-configurations)(2.7.0)

attributes.name: value-on-clear
attributes.desc: clear return value, [see config-provider](/en-US/component/config-provider#empty-values-configurations)(2.7.0)

attributes.name: popper-append-to-body
attributes.desc: whether to append the popper menu to body. If the positioning of the popper is wrong, you can try to set this prop to false(deprecated)

attributes.name: tabindex
attributes.desc: tabindex for input(2.9.0)

props.name: value
props.desc: specify which key of node object is used as the node's value

props.name: label
props.desc: specify which key of node object is used as the node's label

props.name: options
props.desc: specify which key of node object is used as the node's children

props.name: disabled
props.desc: specify which key of node object is used as the node's disabled

slots.name: header ^(2.5.2)
slots.desc: content at the top of the dropdown

slots.name: footer ^(2.5.2)
slots.desc: content at the bottom of the dropdown

slots.name: tag ^(2.5.0)
slots.desc: content as Select tag, subTags `data`, `selectDisabled` and `deleteTag` introduced in ^(2.10.3)

slots.name: label ^(2.7.4)
slots.desc: content as Select label. `index` introduced in ^(2.11.2)

events.name: @change
events.desc: triggers when the selected value changes, the param is current selected value

events.name: @visible-change
events.desc: triggers when the dropdown appears/disappears, the param will be true when it appears, and false otherwise

events.name: @remove-tag
events.desc: triggers when a tag is removed in multiple mode, the param is removed tag value

events.name: @clear
events.desc: triggers when the clear icon is clicked in a clearable Select

methods.name: blur
methods.desc: blur the Input component, and hide the dropdown
